name: Pickle Journey
description:
Jump and dodge your way to victory! Beat the levels and win!

Up arrow to jump. Down arrow to duck. Right arrow, left arrow, or spacebar to shoot. Don't die. Win. --NEW ENDINGS! (scroll down for details) 1 Original ending (play the game normally) 2 Cheaters ending (beat with exploits HINT: replay levels) 3 No pain ending (beat without taking damage

Thank you to @ZachOdie @colbybubba and @CattLuke This is a fan game of bacon journey by @ZachOdie First bacon journey: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/120261954/ Second bacon journey: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/125850011/ Third bacon journey: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/125830486/ I also got inspiration from @colbybubba for his kitchen journey games. Kitchen Journey I: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/209778851/ Kitchen Journey II: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/203258398/ As always thank you to @CattLuke for showing me these games.
